import Layout from '../components/PageLayout'; import {Jumbotron, Button, Carousel, Navbar, Container, Nav, CardGroup, Card} from 'react-bootstrap'; import { Link, DirectLink, Element, Events, animateScroll as scroll, scrollSpy, scroller } from 'react-scroll' import ScrollAnimation from 'react-animate-on-scroll'; import PicturePanel from '../components/PicturePanel'; import PicturePanelFlipped from '../components/PicturePanelFlipped'; import CenterPanel from '../components/CenterPanel'; const Index = () => ( Taras scroll.scrollToTop()}> {' '} Taras
scroller.scrollTo('features', {duration: 800,delay: 0,smooth: 'easeInOutQuart'})}>Features

Features
